Reference

venndir Core Functions

Core functions for venndir

render_venndir()

Render Venn or Euler diagram

signed_overlaps()

Signed overlaps

textvenn()

Text Venn diagram

venndir()

Directional Venn diagram

Set and Incidence Matrix Functions

Functions that manipulate sets, list, and incidence matrices.

counts2setlist()

venndir conversion from overlap counts to setlist

im2list()

Incidence matrix to list

im_value2list()

Value incidence matrix to list

list2im_opt()

Optimized list to incidence matrix

list2im_value()

Optimized list to signed incidence matrix

overlaplist2setlist()

venndir conversion from overlap list to setlist

signed_counts2setlist()

venndir conversion from signed overlap counts to setlist

venndir Utility Functions

Helpful utility functions

curate_venn_labels()

Curate Venn labels

degrees_to_adj()

Degrees to text adjustment

diff_degrees()

Angular difference in degrees

display_angles()

Display degree angles around a unit circle

eulerr2polys()

Convert euler output to polygons

expand_range()

Expand numeric range

find_vennpoly_overlaps()

Find Venn polygon overlaps

get_largest_polygon()

Largest polygon in a SpatialPolygons object

get_sp_buffer()

Get SpatialPolygons after applying buffer width

get_venn_shapes()

Get Venn shapes

intersect_polygons()

Intersect one or more polygons

label_polygon_fill()

Arrange text labels inside a polygon

make_color_contrast()

Make color contrast

make_venn_combn_df()

Make full Venn combination data.frame

make_venn_test()

Generate test sets for venndir

match_list()

Match list elements to another list

mean_degree_arc()

Mean arc angle in degrees

mean_degrees()

Mean angle in degrees

nudge_sp()

Nudge SpatialPolygons

nudge_venndir_label()

Nudge venndir label

polygon_label_outside()

Polygon label outside

polygon_label_segment()

Define a polygon label line segment

print_color_df()

Print colorized text table

rescale_coordinates()

Scale, rotate, and shift numeric coordinates

rescale_p()

Rescale a Polygon object

rescale_ps()

Rescale a Polygons object

rescale_sp()

Rescale a SpatialPolygons object

shrink_df()

Shrink data.frame by group

sp_circles()

Make SpatialPolygons circles

sp_ellipses()

Make SpatialPolygons ellipses

sp_percent_area()

Percent area for each polygon in SpatialPolygons

sp_polylabelr()

Get SpatialPolygons polylabelr coordinate

spread_degrees()

Spread angles to minimum degrees difference

union_polygons()

Union one or more polygons

venndir_label_style()

venndir label style
